Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Trident, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft or 20/60ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Lizardfolk makes 2 attacks, one with its Bite and one with its Claws or Trident, OR 2 attacks with its Trident

Abilities.Ability 1: Hold Breath, The Lizardfolk can hold its breath for about 15 minutes
Abilities.Ability 2: Skewer, When the King/Queen hits with its Trident, the target takes an Average extra 10 damage and the King/Queen gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage
